abstract: Prudential Financial plans to sell its minority stake in Wachovia‘s brokerage unit to Wells Fargo in a deal that could yield the nation’s second-largest life insurance company a $1.7 billion after-tax gain.
lead_paragraph: Prudential Financial plans to sell its minority stake in Wachovia‘s brokerage unit to Wells Fargo in a deal that could yield the nation’s second-largest life insurance company a $1.7 billion after-tax gain.

headline.main: Prudential to Sell Wachovia Securities Stake to Wells
